results.title: Mirror of Germany. No. 082 = Deutschland Spiegel
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel”.
Magazine items: The Federal President visits France; meeting of the European Economic Community; the Berlin Film Festival; Dr Adenaur visits Berlin; refugees in Berlin; memorial to anti-Nazi resistance workers; the new Memorial Church in Berlin; meeting of Protestant clergy; the small north German town of Bad Zwischenahn; the fishing industry based on Bremerhaven; a festival of national costume in Reit-im-Winkl; the 92nd German Derby in Hamburg.

results.title: Mirror of Germany. No. 081 = Deutschland Spiegel
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel”.
President de Gaulle’s visit to Bonn; memorial ceremony to those killed in the Berlin rising; State visit of the President of Togoland; marriage of Princess Birgitta of Sweden and Georg von Hohenzollern; foreign workers; Hamburg; award to German actors; the German Derby.

results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel”.
Magazine items: Visitors from Africa in Bonn; King Baudouin and Queen Fabiola visit Belgian NATO troops in Germany; visit of the Guatemalan Foreign Minister; fashions from Berlin; nation-wide Mothers’ Aide scheme; the 15th German Industries Fair in Hanover; a travelling exhibition of Germany’s post-war development; public health; an alpine gliding school.

results.brief_description:

Magazine items: Rescue work in the Bavarian Alps; Dr Adenauer’s visit to President Kennedy; reception camp in Berlin for refugees from the Soviet Zone; spring in Berlin; an experimental workshop to assist young people in their choice of career; German periodical on humanity; Arab thoroughbred stud farm; peasant wedding in an Alpine village.

results.title: Mirror of Germany. No. 078 = Deutschland Spiegel
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel”.
Magazine items: The 6th International Long Distance Ski Jumping Contest; German Alpine Ski Championships; foreign students in West Germany; Dr Von Brentano discusses joint Western policy with President Kennedy; a Press conference with Dr Adenauer; a parade of spring fashions in Wisebaden; the storks return with the spring; cross-country cycling championships.

results.title: Mirror of Germany. No. 077 = Deutschland Spiegel
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel”.
Magazine items: The all-German Synod of the Evangelical Church, in Berlin; the destruction of the old Anhalter railway station; international riding tournament; the West German President welcomes the President of Pakistan; Dr Adenauer visits Paris; NATO winter manoeuvres; an exhibition of educational methods; filming in the Ruhr; lost property offices; a new ice-breaker tested on the Konigsee.

results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel”.

results.title: Mirror of Germany. No. 074 = Deutschland Spiegel
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel”.
Magazine items: The popular dachshund; the Schiller Museum in Marbach; African exhibition in Bonn; a new dam in the Ruhr; a children’s village in Sulzburg; dealing with the record vintage of 1960; ten-pin bowling; a ball game on motorcycles; ballroom dancing championships in Berlin.
